content: नागरक, नागरिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नगरे भवः वुञ्] {@--1@} Town-bred, town-born. {@--2@} Polite, courteous, courtly; नागरिकवृत्त्या संज्ञापयैनां <ls>Ś. 5</ls>; साधु आर्य नागरिकोसि <ls>V. 2.</ls> {@--3@} Clever, shrewd, cunning (विदग्ध). --कः {@--1@} A citizen. {@--2@} A polite or courteous man, a gallant; one who shows exaggerated attention to his first mistress while he is courting some one else. {@--3@} One who has contracted the vices of a town. {@--4@} A thief. {@--5@} An artist. {@--6@} The chief of the police; <ls>V. 5</ls>; <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> --कं Dry ginger. (--रिकं) The toll levied from a town.
